titleStmt.title: A testimony of what we believe of Christ before he was manifest in the flesh and of his birth and preaching ... and also the testimony of the apostles concerning Him ... also how the believers in the primitive times, and now, did and do possess and enjoy Christ Jesus ... and wherein they may see what a true Christians duty is / by George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.
